email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 15,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $45 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HARMONY, which has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Henderson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. We are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Michael Choi
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of $42 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $8,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Henderson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $42 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Michael Choi
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of $8,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Henderson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Michael Choi
Charterer Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Henderson
Maritime Brokers
